responses.title: Name's Meepo. Geomancer. Pleased to meet ya.
Let's get this over with. I ain't leaving empty handed!
Probably gonna dig a grave or two before this is done.
First blood! Hey everyone's gotta start somewhere. Nha ha ha ha!
One paw in front of the other!
Ah it's too bright out here.
Where do you think you're going?
Ain't nothing gonna stop me now!
This pack ain't so heavy no more!
It's all coming together for me.
Hn ha ha ha ha ha ah ha ha ha ha nn ha ha ha ha!
Nn ha he ha he ha he ha ya ya ha!
Oh now that's what I'm talking about!
Should do it again some time!
Aww, didn't mean to hurt ya. Much.
I guess size ain't everything, eh? Eh!? Ha ha ha aww it is.
I guess size ain't everything, eh?
I know just the place to plant you.
You got some dirt on ya. Here's some more!
That's enough cave-ins out of you!
Just let me pry a few of those gems off of you.
If nobody else wants that fish...
You ain't the boss of me!
You're the king of sand? Well I'm the king of dirt!
You and what army, Phantom Lancer?
About time he keeled over. I'm parched!
Shame to hear that voice go to waste..
Hey Earthshaker! Gonna cave in the competition? Hnyanya!
Hey Hunter! I took care of that thing for ya.
Hey Rubick! If you ever wanna sell some of those gems...
Hey Rubick! I can get you a few more of those magic jewels. Just ask.
Careful King Sandy. Dirt's a lot harder than sand.
You punched out all of my blood!
Can't die yet. I got too much left to do!
Where's the rest of us? We'll take 'im!
Ain't the first hole I've crawled out of!
I feel fine. Don't know what everyone's worried about.
I meant to do that. Yep!
Arm and a leg and a tooth...
You know maybe I oughtta open a shop. Lot of money flowing through here.
Hey what kind of scam you running here?
Ah scept--uh wait where did you come from?
Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
This is a real freakin' embarrasment.
You guys! We're all gonna be rich! Rich!!
Say hello to my lesser friends!
Now that's what I'm talking about!
This must'a fallen off a wagon!

name: Attempting to Use an Ability on Cooldown
Attempting to Use an Ability without Mana

responses.title: Don't tell nobody, but this one's already in the bag!
Hey! Hey! Don't tell nobody, but this one's already in the bag!
I'm sick of scrambling around in the dirt. Gotta find a way to get us back on our feet!
This smile's worth nearly everything I got!
All these fancy knights and scary monsters. Pff! What do they got that I ain't got? Nothing, that's what.
Ain't no problem some tools and a few strong backs can't solve!
Y'gotta be kidding me with that.
Ya so I oughtta put you in the dirt nn km.
Nha ha ha! Ha ha ha ha ha!
Eh hee hee hee hee hee.
